ResearchProjectDef.label: chitin weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Dunmer style chitin weapons at the Ashlander forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bonemold weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows the creation of Dunmeri style bonemold weapons, at the Dunmeri forge.

While they require less steel to craft than comparable weapons, this substitution also reduces their overall quality, causing them to deal slightly less damage

While bonemold melee weapons are mostly used due to their utilitarian nature, bonemold longbows are well renowned for their flexibility and precision.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Morag Tong blades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Morag Tong style weapons, at the Dunmeri forge.\n\nA Tong specialised in making people disappear, their weapons are designed to strike fast and true, but suffer against multiple adversaries.

ResearchProjectDef.label: doctrine weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Doctrine style Ordinator weapons, at the Dunmeri forge.\n\nWeapons typically utilised by the Order of Doctrine and Ordination, these gold-coated ebony weapons are truly formidable on combat, though sacrifice some of their potential for aesthetics.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dunmeri throwing weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Dunmer style throwing weapons, as well as special belts to carry them in.\n\nFurther research will unlock different weapons.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dunmeri explosive weapons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Dunmer style explosive weapons, as well as special belts to carry them in, at the Dunmeri forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Morag Tong smoke-bomb belt
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Morag Tong smoke-bomb belts at the Dunmeri forge.\n\nThese belts are designed in such a way that a single smoke-bomb is released when the wearer takes damage, though the bombs can be manually released as well.

ResearchProjectDef.label: leather armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Dunmer style leather armour at the Ashlander forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: chitin armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Dunmer style chitin armour at the Ashlander forge.

ResearchProjectDef.label: bonemold armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Dunmeri style bonemold armour, at the Dunmeri forge.\n\nBonemold armor provides reasonable protection, it is comparatively more flexible than steel, though not as durable. Bonemold is also better at dispersing heat, rather useful in the ashlands.

ResearchProjectDef.label: doctrine ordinator armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows for the creation of Doctrine style Ordinator armour, at the Dunmeri forge.

Intricately crafted, out of an assortment of materials, wearers of this armour are feared by all, and themselves fear little.

The darkened colouration of Night Raid Ordinator armour, compared to the regular Ordinator set, makes it perfect for night time missions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: mourning ordinator armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows for the creation of Necrom style Ordinator armour, at the Dunmeri forge.\n\nRarely seen outside of the holy city of Necrom, the design of the armour attunes its wearer to the unseen.

ResearchProjectDef.label: high ordinator armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of Mournhold style Ordinator armour, at the Dunmeri forge.\n\nOrnately decorated, and made out of only the finest materials, far more protective than other Ordinator styles, but also heavier.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dres armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows for the creation of Great House Dres style armour, at the Dunmeri forge.

Famed for their proficiency with slaves, Dres armour tends to be lighter than most, but still adequately protective.

Further research will unlock different armour sets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hlaalu armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows the creation of Great House Hlaalu style armour, at the Dunmeri forge.

Usually ones to favour words over weapons, Hlaalu armour strikes a good balance between form and function.

Further research will unlock different armour sets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Indoril armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows the creation of Great House Indoril style armour, at the Dunmeri forge.

Always the most faithful supporters of the Temple, and growing increasingly indistinguishable from it over time, Indoril armour provides more than just physical protection.

Further research will unlock different armour sets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Redoran armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows the creation of Great House Redoran style armour, at the Dunmeri forge.

The most militaristic of the Great Houses, whether fighting in snow, or in swamps, House Redoran has a set of armour suited for any situation.

Further research will unlock different armour sets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Telvanni armour
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows the creation of Great House Telvanni style armour, at the Dunmeri forge.

Never particularly ones for war, House Telvanni instead creates armour designed to augment their abilities, often out of peculiar materials.

Further research will unlock different armour sets.

ResearchProjectDef.label: elite Redoran armour
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of elite Great House Redoran style armour, at the Dunmeri forge.
